revised_title: Fracture of the Os Ilium and Its Cure: A Case Study
tldr: This article presents a case study of a patient who suffered a fracture of the Os Ilium and successfully recovered through a specific treatment method. The author, D. P. Layard, describes the incident, the examination of the injury, and the steps taken to reduce and heal the fracture, including the use of a napkin, compresses, and a spica bandage. The patient made a full recovery within three weeks.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Orthopedic Surgery
